Package com.intellij.openapi.util.registry

Class Registry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.util.registry.Registry

  • public final class Registry
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a UI to configure internal settings of the IDE. Plugins can provide their own registry keys using the <registryKey> extension point (see com.intellij.openapi.util.registry.RegistryKeyBean for more details).
